com.llsx.pps

Class PpsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.llsx.pps.PpsManager

  • public class PpsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages public and private screens.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PpsManager

        public PpsManager()
        Constructs a new PpsManager with default settings

      • PpsManager

        public PpsManager(Context mContext,
          boolean screenType,
          boolean sessionMode)
        Constructs a new PpsManager for the given context, screen type and session mode.
        Parameters:
        mContext - current context of the device
        screenType - screen type of the device; PpsManager.PRIVATE or PpsManager.PUBLIC
        sessionMode - current session of the device

        Starts the network manager and connects the app to the network.

      • addPublicScreen

        public void addPublicScreen(java.lang.String deviceId,
                   java.lang.String deviceName)
        Adds the device into the list of public screens.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - unique identifier (ID) of the device
        deviceName - name representation for the device (e.g. "Gameboard1")

      • removeFromPublicScreen

        public void removeFromPublicScreen(java.lang.String deviceId)
        Remove the given device from the list of public screens.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - unique identifier (ID) of the device to be removed

      • getPublicScreenNameList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPublicScreenNameList()
        Returns:
        The list of name representations (e.g. "Gameboard1") for the public screen devices.

      • addPrivateScreen

                    java.lang.String deviceName)
        Adds the device into the list of private screens.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - unique identifier (ID) of the device
        deviceName - name representation of the device (e.g. "Player1")

      • isPrivate

        Returns:
